comment: Super easy class. The lectures are not that boring and he keeps you entertained. Attendance is not mandatory but he does throw out pop assignments randomly throughout the semester. They are super easy and often do not take long to do. Make sure to not forget about the job fair or workshops as they count a lot towards your grade! Overall easy class.

The professor is pretty cool. He will take the time to have a conversation with you if you are interested in anything that was mentioned in class. He gives pretty insightful advice for interviews and careers. Class is pretty boring but it is very easy.
Very great. Attendance isn't mandatory but he does sometimes do in person assignments. Really helped with the career side of psych!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Gives good feedback--So many papers

comment: Professor Miller was by far my favorite professor at ksu. He is very understanding if you cannot make it to class and assignments are simple (gives great feedback too). His lectures are also great! As long as you communicate and do your work... this should be an easy A. If I could take his class again i would. Anybody saying otherwise is lying!

He's a solid lecturer who cares about his students and can be very flexible if need be. He really wants to prepare you for the real world and is super nice, although class can get a little awkward if no one responds to his questions. No tests or quizzes, only the occasional writing or research assignment on your career interests. Super chill class.
